[▼ch-1]
[#Die Formen von be – Übungen]

[.multiple-choice-text:bitmark--]
[@id:225370]
[%Nr. 1824]
[!Wähle die richtige Form von to be aus und setze __am, are, is, was, were__ oder __will__ be ein.]

0. The weather [+was][-were][-am][-are][-is][-will be][@example] great last weekend.

1. I [+am][-are][-was][-is][-will be][-were] from Canada.
2. We  [+were][-am][-are][-was][-is][-will be] at home two weeks ago.
3.  Victoria [+was][-were][-am][-are][-is][-will be] late this morning.
4. Lisa and Jeff [+are][-were][-am][-was][-is][-will be] really happy now.
5. I [+was][-were][-am][-are][-is][-will be] in London last year.
6. His sister [+is][-were][-am][-are][-was][-will be] a painter. She lives in Chicago.
7. Jack [+will be][-were][-am][-are][-was][-is] 25 next week.
8. They [+were][-am][-are][-was][-is][-will be] on the wrong bus yesterday.
9. We [+are][-were][-am][-was][-is][-will be] in Hamburg at the moment. It is great.
10. It [+is][-were][-am][-are][-was][-will be] only cloudy now, but there will be some rain tomorrow.

bit.body:
0. The weather {0} great last weekend.

1. I {1} from Canada.
2. We  {2} at home two weeks ago.
3.  Victoria {3} late this morning.
4. Lisa and Jeff {4} really happy now.
5. I {5} in London last year.
6. His sister {6} a painter. She lives in Chicago.
7. Jack {7} 25 next week.
8. They {8} on the wrong bus yesterday.
9. We {9} in Hamburg at the moment. It is great.
10. It {10} only cloudy now, but there will be some rain tomorrow.

bit.instruction: Wähle aus den Vorgaben entweder **There is** oder **There are** aus. Achte auf Singular/Einzahl oder Plural/Mehrzahl.
